short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Check how space in your Google Drive are used.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A Chrome extension that helps to analyze Google Drive / Google Photo storage usage allow users to easily view and manage the amount of storage space being used on their Google Drive. The extension provide a breakdown of the types of files and folders that are taking up space. 

It uses the Pareto principle, which states that roughly 80% of effects come from 20% of causes, to help users identify which files and folders are taking up the most space on their Drive.

Overall, this extension would be a useful tool for anyone looking to better manage their Google Drive storage and ensure that they have enough space for all of their important files and documents.

Updates in v 0.2.0
- Added analysing of Google Photo space
- Improved overall styling
